description.translate: Serious and determined, such is the masterless warrior's determination.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§9Rapière\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Grave et déterminée, telle est\"}","{\"text\":\"§7la détermination du guerrier sans maître.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7Serious and determined, such is\"}","{\"text\":\"§7the masterless warrior's determination.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7HER§a1 §7DAR§a1 §7SPD§c-1\"}"]}}
